modName: Otherworld ENB - Climates of Tamriel edition
summary: Make Skyrim creepy again. Dark Fantasy style ENB adapted specifically for Climates of Tamriel -  Performance, Ultra  and night eye versions now available.  Use the latest ENB binary .315   Updated 7/24/16 all editions for lighting, fog and DoF fixes
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=4]Otherworld ENB for Climates of Tamriel

by [url=https://www.tumblr.com/blog/belmontswhip]mobiusbelmont[/url][/size]
[/size][/center][size=5]

Vivid Weather edition is now available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86512/?]here[/url]


GENERAL INFO:  [/size]
- All editions of Otherworld ENB are designed to give Skyrim a dark fantasy type atmosphere.  God Rays, dark skies, and pale sunlight are
the hallmarks of  this preset.  Dark Shadows and Lovecraft editions are compatible with Night Eye.  Use ENB binary 292 or great (compatible
with v305).

- Climates of Tamriel is required for ENB preset!!  

- Other highly recommended mods I use with the CoT version of Otherworld ENB:
  Realistic Water two
  watercolor for ENB
  ELFX (no exteriors)
  Vivid Clouds and Fogs

[size=4]

[/size]



[size=5]DESCRIPTION:  [/size]

There are FOUR editions of Otherworld ENB to choose from

1. Dead Lights: bright days and dark nights
[img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/cae6af94af6b293e5567eaa8b042a4a2/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso4_400.jpg[/img][img]https://67.media.tumblr.com/4287a06a00256a7e7387b966cf17b8fc/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso3_400.jpg[/img]


2. Dark Shadows: dark days and nights also compatible with Night Eye
[img]https://65.media.tumblr.com/2d42c65faf756ccf2baad59021e660e0/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso2_400.jpg[/img][img]https://67.media.tumblr.com/fb669d0fc36f7c64b50cc5983a17707a/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso1_400.jpg[/img]



3. Restless Dreams: bright/foggy days with vibrant nights
[img]https://67.media.tumblr.com/01292f848bbc8584733fe344eefb3f10/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso5_400.jpg[/img][img]https://67.media.tumblr.com/16217299360346105640f44881495f6b/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso6_400.jpg[/img]



4. Lovecraft: dark days and nights with minimal color, also compatible with night eye
[img]https://67.media.tumblr.com/f38bd17801f08a93a596e5ade821aeeb/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso7_400.jpg[/img][img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/47bb0e6756eb852d9cfdd3d7a88341dd/tumblr_o8spi4U2NZ1s2ptqso8_400.jpg[/img]






If you use vanilla lighting and weather in the game then check out my original versions of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73073/?]Otherworld ENB


[/url] A version of Otherworld ENB (called [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76082/?][size=2][b]Mørkt ENB[/b][/size][/url]) is available for Vivid Weathers



[size=5]INSTALLATION:
[/size]
1.Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost files from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]here[/url] to your Skyrim folder (use the latest wrapper version but binary .292 or greater will work)


2.Copy and paste the Otherworld ENB files to your Skyrim folder. 
A. Choose ONE edition of Otherworld: Dark Shadows, The Dead Lights, Restless Dreams, or Lovecraft
B.  Choose ONE of the options inside the main RAR file: Performance (slow/old PC or video card). Regular, or Ultra (4GB card recommended)
3. Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values:
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0

4.  If you are using STEAM overlay for screenshots then your game may look funny or weird.  Open the injector.ini file included in this mod
and look for the last entry.  Change 0 to 1  to enable help with STEAM
overlay (this will also make your screenshots look nicer). 
Another option is to disable STEAM over lay.  To disable STEAM overlay (and get a
slight performance boost in your game) click on the steam icon and
select "settings".  In the settings menu click "in-game", then look
uncheck STEAM overlay.

5. Make sure anti-aliasing and anisotropic filtering are set to 0 in the Skyrim Launcher (pretty much standard
practice for any ENB preset)



CONSULT THE STEP GUIDE FOR ENB FOR MORE INFORMATION ON HOW YOU SHOULD CONFIGURE YOUR enbseries and enblocal files for YOUR RIG

Check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?]this guide[/url] for configuring ENB and your Skyrim



[size=5]MISC. NOTES:[/size]

- SweetFX is NOT used in this ENB preset. 

- SMAA IS used in this preset so make sure either the steam overlay is turned
off, OR you make the adjustment to the injector ini as stated above in
step 4.
[b]
- This is fantasy, or at least my interpretation of it.  This ENB is not meant to be realistic. [/b] 

- Dusk/Dawn is NOT enabled so this preset should be compatible with older ENB binaries (272 and greater)

- Thread fixes are disabled, enable them if you need/want to

- Depth of Field is enabled by default for regular and ULTRA versions, and disabled for the
performance versions.  You can disable it by opening the enbseries
folder, find DepthOfField under Effect and change true to false.

- These effects are disabled for performance versions: lens effect, depth of
field, cloudshadows, and edge AA.  Quality of effects are medium to
low.  FPS limiter is enabled and set at 58 FPS to help reduce
stuttering. 

- Extra Special Thanks to Kobalk and team for permission to use their truly amazing Depth of Field and bloom shaders
from the outstanding [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67483/?]Rampage ENB[/url]



[size=5]CREDITS:[/size]
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series Developer (http://enbdev.com/index_en.html)
original Depth of Field by matso
high quality Depth of Field tweaks by Kobalk and team (from Rampage ENB)
bloom shader by Kobalk and team (Rampage ENB)
SMAA by mrhaandi (http://mrhaandi.blogspot.com/p/injectsmaa.html)
ultimate shader effect add-on by Miratheus (http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3274)
Kyo- sunsprite shader
nanoman2000: sunsprite textures (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68274/?)
palette textures by yours truly
author: mobiusbelmont
